Class Grid2DLayout

java.lang.Object
repast.simphony.visualization.grid.Grid2DLayout
All Implemented Interfaces:
Layout<Object,Grid>
public class Grid2DLayout extends Object implements Layout<Object,Grid>
Layout for a 2D single occupancy grid.
